parameters.name: Gender
parameters.description: Primary gender classification for character creation

options.name: Identify as male
options.visual: Masculine-presenting gender identity.

options.name: Identify as female
options.visual: Feminine-presenting gender identity.

parameters.name: Visual Heritage
parameters.description: Observable ancestry category based on physical traits

options.name: European Heritage
options.visual: Lighter skin, varied eye and hair colors, narrow facial features.
options.as_seen_in: Populations across Europe and European diaspora.

options.name: African Heritage
options.visual: Darker skin tones, broader nose, fuller lips, coiled hair textures.
options.as_seen_in: Sub-Saharan Africa, Afro-Caribbean, and African-American populations.

options.name: East Asian Heritage
options.visual: Straight black hair, epicanthic eye folds, light to medium skin tones.

options.name: South Asian Heritage
options.visual: Medium to dark skin tones, dark hair, diverse nose and eye shapes.
options.as_seen_in: Indian subcontinent including India, Pakistan, Bangladesh, Sri Lanka.

options.name: Southeast Asian Heritage
options.visual: Medium-toned skin, rounder face, dark straight hair.

options.name: Native American Heritage
options.visual: Medium to light-brown skin, straight dark hair, high cheekbones.
options.as_seen_in: Indigenous peoples of North, Central, and South America.

options.name: Latino Heritage
options.visual: Mixed ancestry with a wide range of features from European, Indigenous, and African heritage.
options.as_seen_in: Latin American populations, including Central and South America.

parameters.name: Age
parameters.description: Developmental life stage estimation based on visual maturity

options.name: Pre-adolescent Child
options.visual: Small stature, soft rounded features, high fat-to-muscle ratio.

options.name: Teenage
options.visual: Rapid growth stage, transitional facial features, hormonal changes visible.

options.name: Youthful Adult
options.visual: Fully developed physical features, smooth skin, high vitality.

options.name: Mature Adult
options.visual: Subtle signs of aging, increased muscle and bone structure definition.

options.name: Middle-Aged
options.visual: Prominent aging markers, reduced skin elasticity, deepened features.

options.name: Elderly-Senior
options.visual: Wrinkled skin, visible muscle loss, bone prominence.

age_position.name: None (default)
age_position.visual: Standard expression of the age category.
age_position.as_seen_in: Typical manifestation of the selected age.

age_position.name: Early
age_position.visual: Beginning phase of the age category.
age_position.as_seen_in: Earlier manifestation of the selected age.

age_position.name: Mid
age_position.visual: Middle phase of the age category.
age_position.as_seen_in: Average manifestation of the selected age.

age_position.name: Late
age_position.visual: Final phase of the age category.
age_position.as_seen_in: Later manifestation of the selected age.

parameters.name: Build
parameters.description: Overall body shape and mass distribution

options.name: Slender
options.visual: Narrow frame with minimal body mass.
options.as_seen_in: Common across all populations, typically with lower body fat percentage.

options.name: Rectangle
options.visual: Straight vertical silhouette with minimal waist definition.
options.as_seen_in: Common among both male and female bodies.

options.name: Inverted-Triangle
options.visual: Broad shoulders tapering to a narrower waist and hips.
options.as_seen_in: Often seen in mesomorphic male builds.

options.name: Pear
options.visual: Narrow upper body with broader hips and thighs.
options.as_seen_in: Often seen in endomorphic female builds.

options.name: Hourglass
options.visual: Balanced bust and hip width with a narrow waist.
options.as_seen_in: Frequently idealized in fashion and fitness models.

options.name: Apple
options.visual: Rounded midsection with less waist definition.
options.as_seen_in: Seen across all genders, especially in middle-aged individuals.

options.name: Curvy
options.visual: Rounded contours with emphasis on bust, hips, and thighs.
options.as_seen_in: Often seen in fuller female body types.

options.name: V-Shaped
options.visual: Broad upper torso narrowing to the waist.

options.name: Athletic
options.visual: Muscular build with defined structure and minimal fat.
options.as_seen_in: Seen in individuals engaged in regular training or sports.

options.name: Muscular
options.visual: High muscle mass, prominent definition.

options.name: Stocky
options.visual: Shorter, broad body with thick limbs.

options.name: Heavyset
options.visual: Wide, solid frame with higher fat mass.

options.name: Lean
options.visual: Thin but toned, low fat with some muscle definition.

build_intensity.name: None (default)
build_intensity.visual: Standard expression of the build characteristics.
build_intensity.as_seen_in: Typical manifestation of the selected build.

build_intensity.name: Slightly
build_intensity.visual: Mild expression of the build characteristics.
build_intensity.as_seen_in: Subtle manifestation of the selected build.

build_intensity.name: Moderately
build_intensity.visual: Clear expression of the build characteristics.
build_intensity.as_seen_in: Noticeable manifestation of the selected build.

build_intensity.name: Notably
build_intensity.visual: Strong expression of the build characteristics.
build_intensity.as_seen_in: Prominent manifestation of the selected build.

build_intensity.name: Extremely
build_intensity.visual: Maximum expression of the build characteristics.
build_intensity.as_seen_in: Extreme manifestation of the selected build.

parameters.name: Height
parameters.description: Vertical stature relative to gender and heritage norms

options.name: Very Short
options.visual: Noticeably below average height for gender and heritage.
options.as_seen_in: Adults below the 5th percentile of regional height charts.

options.name: Short
options.visual: Below average stature with proportional limbs.

options.name: Average
options.visual: Median height range relative to gender and heritage.

options.name: Tall
options.visual: Above average height with longer limbs.

options.name: Very Tall
options.visual: Exceptional height beyond typical regional averages.
options.as_seen_in: Adults above the 95th percentile in global populations.

parameters.name: Skin Tone
parameters.description: Observable pigmentation range independent of lighting or styling

options.name: Very Fair
options.visual: Extremely pale skin, often with visible pink or blue undertones.
options.as_seen_in: Common among Northern European populations and individuals with albinism.

options.name: Fair
options.visual: Light skin with subtle pink, yellow, or neutral undertones.
options.as_seen_in: Often seen in Central European and East Asian heritage groups.

options.name: Light
options.visual: Beige-toned skin with golden or neutral undertones.
options.as_seen_in: Typical among Southern European, Middle Eastern, and mixed-heritage individuals.

options.name: Medium
options.visual: Balanced brown skin with no dominant undertone.
options.as_seen_in: Common across Southeast Asian, Latino, and Native American populations.

options.name: Tan
options.visual: Warm brown skin with sun-reactive pigmentation.
options.as_seen_in: Frequently seen in Mediterranean and South American descent.

options.name: Deep
options.visual: Dark brown skin with higher melanin density.
options.as_seen_in: Typically found in Sub-Saharan African, Afro-Caribbean, and South Indian heritage.

options.name: Very Deep
options.visual: Near-black skin, sometimes with red, blue, or violet undertones.
options.as_seen_in: Common among Central African and Nilotic populations, and some Aboriginal Australian lineages.

skin_tone_intensity.name: None (default)
skin_tone_intensity.visual: Standard tone of the skin color.
skin_tone_intensity.as_seen_in: Typical expression of the selected skin tone.

skin_tone_intensity.name: Light
skin_tone_intensity.visual: Lighter variation of the skin tone.
skin_tone_intensity.as_seen_in: Paler expression of the selected skin tone.

skin_tone_intensity.name: Rich
skin_tone_intensity.visual: More saturated variation of the skin tone.
skin_tone_intensity.as_seen_in: Vibrant expression of the selected skin tone.

skin_tone_intensity.name: Deep
skin_tone_intensity.visual: Darker variation of the skin tone.
skin_tone_intensity.as_seen_in: More intense expression of the selected skin tone.

parameters.name: Skin Texture
parameters.description: Surface quality and condition of skin that affects visual appearance and perceived age

options.name: Fine-Pored
options.visual: Smooth with minimally visible pores and even surface.

options.name: Normal Textured
options.visual: Balanced texture with visible pores and natural variations.

options.name: Weather-Worn
options.visual: Slightly roughened texture from environmental exposure.

options.name: Line-Detailed
options.visual: Natural fine lines that add character without appearing aged.

options.name: Textured Mature
options.visual: Visible pores, fine wrinkles, and natural aging patterns.

options.name: Scarred Character
options.visual: Distinctive marking patterns that add uniqueness.

skin_texture_visibility.name: None (default)
skin_texture_visibility.visual: Standard visibility of the skin texture.
skin_texture_visibility.as_seen_in: Typical manifestation of the selected texture.

skin_texture_visibility.name: Subtle
skin_texture_visibility.as_seen_in: Understated manifestation of the selected texture.

skin_texture_visibility.name: Noticeable
skin_texture_visibility.as_seen_in: Apparent manifestation of the selected texture.

skin_texture_visibility.name: Prominent
skin_texture_visibility.as_seen_in: Striking manifestation of the selected texture.
